评论详情: Love these so much. Very slimming. I ordered one size up and am happy I did.

These are my favorite shorts right now. They do flip up a little when I sit, because of the side slits, but I still love them. I am a mom, and I love my mom shorts! I'm 5'5" 125 lbs and ordered the 26. They fit great, nice high waist and no gap!
